data.title: Rambam Multidisciplinary Medical Center
data.text:
RAMBAM Joint Russian-Israeli Medical Center would like to take this opportunity to wish you health and happiness! Like us you know perfectly well that happiness and health are pretty much inseparable. Only when we are well can we live a full and enjoyable life.

Seeing any of our doctors you may rest assured of being helped by one of the best experts in the field. Our doctors have all the equipment necessary to diagnose disease at the very early stages, ensuring you are notified in good time. We are not afraid of taking responsibility for the way you feel.

RAMBAM Joint Russian-Israeli Medical Center is a multidisciplinary curative and diagnostic facility. It was established by Professor Igor Elkis, M.D., Honored Doctor of the Russian Federation. Our team is formed by competent doctors of standing reputation with rich experience gained in Russia, Germany, the United States and Israel. The Center is a good example of how a clinic can offer highly qualified medical assistance, meeting the highest international standards, combined with an at-home level of comfort.

Rendering medical assistance at home. Those customers who are prevented from coming to the clinic because of the state of their health or the nature of their disease, who are prescribed treatment in bed may be rendered medical assistance at their home by a therapist or a medical team (taking material for medical tests).

The main objective for our well-coordinated team is to preserve and improve the health of each and every patient. Our main commitments are amicability, responsibility and expertise because you place the most precious thing that you have, your health, into our hands. Our center’s experts will not only diagnose you and assign effective treatment for your disease; they will also give you comprehensive recommendations to prevent any diseases.

RAMBAM Joint Russian-Israeli Medical Center:

is a sustainably developing multidisciplinary medical center;

offers a full range of outpatient and polyclinic services;

avails of cutting-edge high-tech equipment for diagnosis, preventive treatment and cure;

employs a highly-qualified team of professionals in different fields of medicine;

offers you a full range of services, applying the most innovative technologies;

is a charitable program providing medical care free of charge to the socially underprivileged groups of population.

Torah says: “Love your neighbor as yourself” (Lev. 19:18). Nahmanides further clarifies this saying that one has to wish any other person to have anything one wishes to have for oneself. In the words of Mikhail Bezelyansky, “This is the reason why our Medical Center was created: we wish every person coming to us to feel this love.”

Opening hours:

Sunday: from 8 a.m. to 7 p.m.

Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday: from 8 a.m. to 8 p.m.

Friday: from 8 a.m. to 3 p.m.
